title: Hopewell Culture National Historical Park: Spruce Hill Summary Report
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning     Spruce Hill Summary Report              Spruce Hill Summary Report          1998 Spruce Hill Summary Report  This study summarizes the results of a re-evaluation of the nature, integrity and significance of the natural and cultural resources of the Spruce Hill Works in southwest Ross County, Ohio.   Summary Report on the Significance, Suitability and Feasibility of the Spruce Hill Works as a Potential Addition to Hopewell Culture NHP - PDF (4.5 MB)
